form.p: This template will create a bndrun for launching a framework using the JaxRS CXF Client Distribution Provider and Zeroconf Discovery
Source code repo for this distribution provider: https://github.com/ECF/JaxRSProviders
Once created, you can resolve the run requirements by clicking the Resolve button the the right-hand side of the bndrun editor.
Once resolved, you can click on Run OSGi or Debug OSGi buttons in the upper right hand side of the bndrun editor to launch.
This will produce output to the OSGi console to show the discovery and import and calling
